mapper.select: SELECT goods_id, DATE_FORMAT(new_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') new_base_rate_dt, new_base_rate, new_add_rate, new_rate1, new_rate2, new_rate3, new_rate4, new_rate5, new_rate6, new_rate7, DATE_FORMAT(used_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') used_base_rate_dt, used_base_rate, used_add_rate, used_rate1, used_rate2, used_rate3, used_rate4, used_rate5, used_rate6, used_rate7 FROM goods_rate WHERE goods_id = 'INSTALLMENT'

SELECT goods_id, DATE_FORMAT(new_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') new_base_rate_dt, new_base_rate, new_add_rate, new_rate1, new_rate2, new_rate3, new_rate4, new_rate5, new_rate6, new_rate7, DATE_FORMAT(used_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') used_base_rate_dt, used_base_rate, used_add_rate, used_rate1, used_rate2, used_rate3, used_rate4, used_rate5, used_rate6, used_rate7 FROM goods_rate WHERE goods_id = 'LONA'

SELECT goods_id, DATE_FORMAT(new_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') new_base_rate_dt, new_base_rate, new_add_rate, new_rate1, new_rate2, new_rate3, new_rate4, new_rate5, new_rate6, new_rate7, DATE_FORMAT(used_base_rate_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') used_base_rate_dt, used_base_rate, used_add_rate, used_rate1, used_rate2, used_rate3, used_rate4, used_rate5, used_rate6, used_rate7 FROM goods_rate WHERE goods_id = 'CAHSBACK'
